title: Japan: country of delight
brief_description: A trip in and around Tokyo, showing the tourist the life and beauty of Japan. Tokyo, with its ten million people, is like Western cities, but has much to offer which is truly Japanese. Yokohama, Nikko and other areas surrounding Tokyo are visited. Shows the life style, industries and arts and crafts as well as the countryside and coastline, ceremonies and festivals.
